籤詩版本二:
Takobin yana haskakawa idan ya fito daga cikin akwatin, amma ba ya jawo kura a cikin akwatin.
Yanzu ina da wani mutum mai daraja da zan nuna, mai iko da iko, kuma kowa yana yaba ni
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar takobin da ke fitowa daga cikin akwatin.
Komai yana da ƙarfi da ƙarfi.
解曰: Takobin yana fitowa daga cikin akwatin. M ga dubban mil. Jagora mai daraja. Komai yana da kyau.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong ya ceci Adou
A lokacin daular Uku, Zhao Yun, mai suna Zilong, ɗan ƙasar Changshan ne. Da farko, ya dogara ga Yuan Shao, sannan ya bi Liu (Bei), ubangijin farko na Western Shu.
A lokacin, Cao Cao ya so ya je kudancin kogin Yangtze, ya fara kai wa tsohon Ubangiji Liu Bei hari a Xinye (sunan wuri), kuma tsohon ubangijin ya gudu zuwa Fancheng. An sake shan kaye a Dangyang kuma 'yan uwansa sun rabu.
Matar ta ba wa Zhao Yun amanar danta Adou (dan Liu Bei, Liu Chan) ga Zhao Yun.
Bayan da Zhao Yun ya yi kuka ya binne matarsa, sai ya rungumi Adou ya yi yaki da shi.
聖意: Ku yi addu'ar fatan alheri a gidanku da gidanku, ku yi addu'a don neman kuɗi, sa'a a cikin ma'amaloli, aure mai kyau, mata masu tafiya a ƙasa, tsummoki na Chitian, lalacewar dabbobi shida, bacewar mutane, ƙarar jama'a, ƙaura, asarar dukiyoyi, cututtukan kudanci, dawowa. tsohon buri, sa'a ga duwatsu da kaburbura
第X籤: Ashirin da tara sun lashe cacar caca
